title: Ep 539 | Robertson Grand Theft Auto, Sucker-Punching, Bitterness as Fuel & the Consuming Fire of God
description:
Jase tells the story of how Reed found himself the victim of grand theft auto and what can lead to a person's rejection of good authority. Phil discusses how the world has become so angry that bitterness is used as fuel, but that God is the ultimate consuming fire. Al tells the story of a man who sucker-punched an innocent person in New York. And Jase shares the number-one thing that "Unashamed" listeners tell him they have difficulty letting go of when it comes to holding a grudge.
